Commands.Break Attack: 2-HIT BRV attack.  Inflicts Status Break for 3 turns to target.  Grants 1 stack of Dressphere for 6 turns (max is 5).  Status Break lowers Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack, Defense and Speed.  Dressphere has the following inclusive effects:  - At 1 stack, raises Max BRV.  - At 2 stacks, raises Speed.  - At 3 stacks, raises Defense.  - At 4 stacks, raises Initial BRV.  - At 5 (max) stacks, raises Attack.
Commands.Black Sky: 6-HIT AoE BRV attack + single target HP attack.  If there's more than 1 enemy, the BRV hits are randomly dispersed.  Grants 1 stack of Dressphere for 6 turns (max is 5).
Commands.Debuff Attack Advance: BRV stolen can overflow by a small amount for 1 turn.  Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to debuffed enemies for 1 turn.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Dancing Sword: 6-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with Status Break.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Turns to Dancing Sword+ while Dressphere V is active.
Commands.Dancing Sword+: 6-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.  Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target.  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with Status Break.  BRV stolen can overflow up to 170% Max BRV.  HP damage is divided equally amongst all enemies.  Grants Wing Arts for 8 turns.   While Wing Arts is active:  - Turns BRV Attack/+ to Triple Cut and HP Attack to HP Attack+.  - Triple Cut is a 3-HIT melee BRV attack.  - HP Attack+ is a 3-HIT melee BRV+HP attack.   Wing Arts raises all party members' Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack, Defense and Speed while lowering all enemies'.

Passives.Break Attack Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Break Attack.
Passives.Debuff Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack while an enemy is debuffed.
Passives.Black Sky Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Black Sky.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Break Attack Charge: Increases Break Attack's max uses by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Black Sky Charge: Increases Black Sky's max uses by 1.
Passives.Gullwing Warrior: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while Dressphere is active.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed Up: Slightly raises Max BRV and Speed while buffed.
Passives.Break Attack Extend: When using break Attack:- Increases the number of BRV hits to 3.- Moderately raises its total potency.- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with Status Break.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Extends the duration of Status Break by 2 turns.- Triggers an HP attack after use.While Dressphere is active:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+.- BRV Attack+ is a 2-HIT melee BRV attack with a moderate potency increase.
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed.
Passives.Black Sky Extend: When using Black Sky:- Increases the number of BRV hits to 9.- Tremendously raises its total potency.- Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with Status Break.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV.
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party's Max BRV and Attack by 10%.
Passives.Debuff Attack Advance Extend: When using Debuff Attack Advance, adds the following effects:- Further raises BRV damage dealt to enemies afflicted with personal debuffs.- Slightly raises the overflow limit.

Weapons.Crystal Sword CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Dancing Sword.
Weapons.Basilisk Steel CP: 35: Raises Black Sky's potency.Grants an additional stack of Dressphere.
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Increases the max uses of Debuff Attack Advance by 1.Extends the duration of its effects by 1 turn.
Weapons.Sword of Paine CP: 15: Raises Break Attack's potency.Grants an additional stack of Dressphere.
